thread.section_title: Shangri-La's China World Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: China World Hotel Horizon Club.
thread.title_full: China World Hotel Horizon Club. - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: warrenbnz
title: China World Hotel Horizon Club.
text: This hotel and Horizon club facility is one of the best we have experienced. Philip Xu. Taylor Dong. Rebecca, Katherina, Tony and in fact all the staff give all guests exceptional service to make every guest feel special and have a great time staying at the hotel. Thank you to all the housekeeping staff too. This is a very well run hotel. The rooms are good and well maintained as is the entire hotel. The lobby area and entertainment provided make for a great overall experience to stay there while in Beijing. We recommend this hotel to anyone going to Beijing.
